sentences.english: My heart was like this, “ she says, patting her chest. But she knew him immediately.
sentences.chinese: “当时我的心脏就像这样，”她边说边拍着她的胸脯。

sentences.english: Pillowed upon my fair love's ripening breast.
sentences.chinese: 枕着我爱人成熟的胸脯。

sentences.english: Pillowed upon my fair love's ripening breast.
sentences.chinese: 以头枕在爱人酥软的胸脯上。

sentences.english: Pig eight quit big clap breast, right away open a medicine a square as follows.
sentences.chinese: 猪八戒大拍胸脯，马上开出如下药方。

sentences.english: Turkey Breast Roulade, Chestnut Stuffing, Cranberry Jelly.
sentences.chinese: 火鸡胸脯颤音，栗子馅，蔓越莓果冻。

sentences.english: He was a regular in talk forums for players of “World of Warcraft, ” using a busty female as his avatar and the handle Conservatism.
sentences.chinese: 他是魔兽世界论坛的常客，用大胸脯美女做头像。

sentences.english: On breast of Mars the goddess sighed.
sentences.chinese: 在马尔斯的胸脯上那女神叹伤。

sentences.english: The sea smites his own barren breast because he has no flowers to offer to the moon.
sentences.chinese: 大海捶击他荒瘠的胸脯，因为它没有花献给月亮。

sentences.english: She plimmed her chest towards them.
sentences.chinese: 她向他们挺起她的胸脯。

sentences.english: The forked bone that lies between the neck and breast of a bird is called the wishbone .
sentences.chinese: 鸟的颈部和胸脯之前呈叉形的骨头被称为“如愿骨”。

sentences.english: See the muscles on his chest.
Bosom i saw , both full , throat warbling.
sentences.chinese: 我看见了胸脯，两边那么丰腴，喉咙颤抖着。

sentences.english: His chest heaved and his body seemed to droop .
sentences.chinese: 他的胸脯上下起伏，身子也好象衰颓了。

sentences.english: He swelled out his chest with pride.
sentences.chinese: 他得意洋洋地挺起了胸脯。

sentences.english: The bird swelled out its chest to attract the attention of the female.
sentences.chinese: 那鸟儿把胸脯鼓起来吸引雌鸟。

definition: to hold in one's arms/to embrace
